Articles.Content: CHristmas break is comign, and I intend to start working on this mod again, so expect some updates. Im going to be remodeling a few pieces going to touch base with some people to help me get the mod into unity. Dont worry I havent abandoned this and it will get done.
Great News
The parts look great! I hope it goes smoothly getting them into the game.
Awesome news, I'm looking forward to it happening.

Great Work, can't wait!!!! Going to make Kerbonatinal Space Agency with this, BobCat's, and Yogui87's mods when it's done.

Edited November 27, 2013 by Ares1275
Any news ?
This looks like an absolutely fantastic model, I can't wait to try it out in game when it is finished.

This looks fantastic! Great progress!

+Rep! (hint,hint)
I'm too lazy to read all posts in this thread... So, are these rockets stock-size compatible? That's something that always bugged me with bobcat's models.

No. Stevincent is making them 64% of the real size (standard for realistic parts in KSP). I think they'll be 5.37 meter.

This is what I remember from reading the thread, at least. Once he finishes them, there might be an easy config file edit to resize them that you could make.
5.376 meters is the correct.
Anyone Home ?
if you do make it 5.37m could you please include an adapter?
These look amazing! I like 5m parts to carry a bunch of stuff at once to places!

Guys, this is dead. Has been for two months at least... Those screenshots are from waay before Crimbo, and he didn't release anything else, so I'm pretty sure it's safe to say this is deaded. Real life gets in the way....

Dont worry I havent abandoned this and it will get done.

Still have faith!

Hey Stevicent! I just wanted to add a few words of encouragement to add to all the other wonderful things people have been saying! This mod looks fantastic, and I wish I could model as well as you can! Keep up the good work!

Guys, this is dead. Has been for two months at least... Those screenshots are from waay before Crimbo, and he didn't release anything else, so I'm pretty sure it's safe to say this is deaded. Real life gets in the way....

I thought 6 months without activity was the norm for declaring stuff dead? Anyway, I'd be sad if this died, as it shows a lot of promise.
Its very quiet in here
I really hope that this thread doesn't die. Those models are so awesome!!!
Some incredible meshes there, with outstanding UV unwrapping. Hate to see this die on the vine.

Some incredible meshes there, with outstanding UV unwrapping. Hate to see this die on the vine.

Yeah it is a pity but don't be afraid of shameless selfpromotion... http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/69414-KOrion-Capsule-First-Mesh-Developed-for-Mod-Work

Edited February 22, 2014 by DasBananenbrot

OMG dude, I havent been on the forums in a while been busy with school but this looks freaking amazing, wish I had the time to continue with my SLS mod!! Man this looks amazing!

he posted this in the Horizon Aeronautics thread, so the guy isn't dead and he hasn't forgotten, it's just IRL getting in the way.

he posted this in the Horizon Aeronautics thread, so the guy isn't dead and he hasn't forgotten, it's just IRL getting in the way.

Yeah it is always RL I never thought he forgot , just that he had no time... But he could write it here so people don't need to guess if this is still bein worked on or not....
Latest design studies point to the core stage being unpainted, so orange.
